group_1.narration: After Hazuki told me about how she let word of@Endless Mirrors slip to Leila's group...@I contacted someone and asked@if we could discuss things in person.

group_1.textRight: ...It seems it's been a while since we last met.

group_1.textLeft: Long time no see.

group_1.textRight: Are the other two still doing alright?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, they're doing just fine.

group_1.textRight: ...So, what did you want to talk about regarding Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: It's about how she went missing.

group_1.textRight: Honestly, where could she have gone off to...?

group_1.textLeft: We've actually been searching for her too.
If she's nowhere to be found, all the Magical Girls in Kamihama will be in trouble.
Right?
And so, there's a few things we've managed to find @out so far.
I thought it best to share that information with you.
We've run into another issue as a result of all this...
They might've gone into Endless Mirrors.
We can take care of searching for them ourselves, though...
So I'd like to request your cooperation in searching @for Mitama.

group_1.textRight: Why Mitama? Wouldn't finding the three of them be more pressing...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I feel like something's been *building up*.
Yes. Something stagnant. That's why things are @flowing in a bad direction...
One bad thing leading to another, like dominoes...
...Yes.
I know there's no basis for any of it. But I can't shake this ominous feeling...
So I want us to deal with this in parallel, rather than just addressing the most obvious problem.

group_1.textRight: And that'll let us resolve all of this much quicker, @then.

group_1.textLeft: Right.
I understand that it's somewhat of a selfish request, but since I imagine you have a stake in this too...

group_1.textRight: ...One of my housemates feels the same.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: One of my housemates has a strong intuition @about this as well.

group_1.textLeft: Your housemate...?

group_1.textRight: You think the Mirror Witch's mansion is suspicious, Tamaki-san...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe I'm just overthinking it, but... I have this sort @of hunch...

group_1.textRight: We've had some strange experiences of our own around that mansion.
I've been looking into it alongside Mitama's case.

group_1.textLeft: Then...!

group_1.textRight: Let's work together on it. It'll be a big help to us, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank goodness...

group_1.textRight: So, what's the information you wanted to share?

group_1.textLeft: Right. I'll explain.
We've been looking into the places Mitama-san frequented before she went missing.
After all, if it was around the same time, there could @be a connection.
And so, we found a particular place that Mitama-san had visited several times.
Two of the girls we've lost contact with happen to @live relatively close by there.
So we requested their cooperation as well...
But they weren't able to locate her, in the end.

group_1.textRight: Could that just mean that your guess was incorrect?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe, but out of all the information we received, @that was the only place with multiple eyewitness @reports of her.
I can't help but feel like this particular possibility is strong...
Not enough evidence, I take it?

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't say that. I'm putting my money on@a hunch too, after all.

group_1.textLeft: A section of Daito Ward called Nishimachi.
Yes...
